GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article requested

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to a specific article, and returns the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article with a vote count amendment, returns the updated article

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the specified comment with no content returned
